title: The Bachelorette: Ciarran Stott performs in a gay drag show at Throb nightclub
text:
Ciarran Stott proudly told Angie Kent about his past as a gay nightclub dancer during Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette.

And following the on-air revelation, more footage has surfaced of the 25-year-old Englishman performing on stage at Darwin's leading LGBT nightspot, Throb.

A video obtained by the Bachie Funny Instagram account shows Ciarran dancing alongside a drag queen and two other scantily-clad men in January 2018.

Spilling the tea! Ciarran Stott (left) proudly told Angie Kent about his past as a gay nightclub dancer during Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette

Ciarran, who looked almost unrecognisable with shorter hair, was dressed in a pair of skimpy shorts with a metal clasp around his private parts.

His near-naked body was adorned with an array of spiked black belts, which were wrapped around the top of his thighs and pectoral muscles.

Despite his cringeworthy dance moves, which resembled those of a '90s boyband, Ciarran oozed confidence and sex appeal as he performed for the crowd.

Going for it! Following the on-air revelation, more footage has surfaced of the 25-year-old Englishman performing on stage at Darwin's leading LGBT nightspot, Throb

Looking good! Despite his cringeworthy dance moves, which resembled those of a '90s boyband, Ciarran oozed sex appeal as he performed for the crowd in January 2018

On Thursday's episode, Ciarran told Angie, 29, about his former profession, saying: 'I used to dance in a gay bar... with, like, drag queens!'

'It was carnage, but it was so much fun!' he added.

Back in 2016, Ciarran starred in a holiday-themed show called Camp Christmas: Freez'n, which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

Gay past: Back in 2016, Ciarran (left) starred in a holiday-themed show called Camp Christmas: Freez'n, which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen (poster pictured)

'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage,' a friend of Ciarran's previously told Daily Mail Australia.

Another insider said he 'only worked at Throb for a few months' but has performed as a dancer at other venues across the Northern Territory.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: Ciarran Stott proudly told Angie Kent about his past as a gay nightclub dancer during Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
